data.comment: The first-half is under way at Madejski Stadium - Luton kick-off to start the match.
Goal! Tom McIntyre gives Reading a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 25, Martin Cranie (Luton) has received a yellow card from Matt Donohue.
Goal! Reading extend their lead to 2-0 through Alfa Semedo.
Reading's Tom McIntyre has been booked in Reading.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Reading kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
The away team have replaced Martin Cranie with Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall. This is the first substitution made today by Nathan Jones.
In the minute 46, Danny Hylton is on a sub for Glen Rea for Luton.
Nathan Jones is making the team's third substitution at Madejski Stadium with Rhys Norrington-Davies replacing George Moncur.
Nathan Jones (Luton) is making a fourth substitution, with Kazenga LuaLua replacing Ruddock Pelly.
In the minute 66, John Swift is replacing Alfa Semedo for Reading at Madejski Stadium.
Kazenga LuaLua (Luton) gets a yellow card.
Harry Cornick is replacing Dan Potts for the away team.
That's full-time at Madejski Stadium. The final score is 2-1.
Goal! Luton reduce the deficit to 2-1 through Kazenga LuaLua.
The home team replace Sone Aluko with Tennai Watson.
